title: Wear Camcorder
summary: Now capture moment,recored video and audio using your Android smart watch.
description: Wear Camcorder is a unique app which lets you control your phone camera from your smart watch making it easy to use your phone as spy camera, lets you record any event , sting any secret operation, monitor activities and many more.Use your creativity to explore your camera, some typical usage can be-1. Use as Selfie Stick2. Get best shots of your loved ones using live preview on your watch3. Record video from phone controlling it using your smart watch4. Record audio directly from smart watch.5. Use as wear camera remote.6. Show camera preview on your watch.Capture & Record  anytime, anywhere on the go!
descriptionHTML:
Wear Camcorder is a unique app which lets you control your phone camera from your smart watch making it easy to use your phone as spy camera, lets you record any event , sting any secret operation, monitor activities and many more.

Use your creativity to explore your camera, some typical usage can be-
1. Use as Selfie Stick
2. Get best shots of your loved ones using live preview on your watch
3. Record video from phone controlling it using your smart watch
4. Record audio directly from smart watch.
5. Use as wear camera remote.
6. Show camera preview on your watch.

Capture & Record anytime, anywhere on the go!
comments: This app is only able to take pics or shoot videos in one pre- installed quality, which is very low and good for nothing. Give us some more settings for the  with higher resolution options, maybe that would make this app useful.

This is a message to Intelligrape Software - The software does not works well with portable device like Huawey watch using OS Wear 2.0   The image coming from the smartphone's camera is not visible on smartwatch display. Probably some adjustment is needed. - Thanks for attention
Simple things that I need I can even see the camera from my watch. Feels like a spy.
Very great app.. It's a very good app, but it needs some more refining, for instance.. to remove sound effect when taking a pictureüëç
Very poor quality image. Functionality is there but development work needed to improve image quality
Works perfect on Sony SmartWatch 3 and Xperia Z3.   Recorded video successfully triggering it from watch.
recentChanges: - Update design for both square and round shape watch
